items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Gorgeous red wine color. Perfect for fall or holiday season. Super soft and stretchy. I sized up because I wore mine as a maternity dress, but I didn’t even need to. Still fit lovely. 10/10 recommend. Read more
items.author: Lauren Saelens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The knit is stretchy—super soft and plush. It has a brass collar decorative piece. Classy.
items.body: This ribbed knit maxi dress is such a win for fall with a brass collar piece. Classy. The off-the-shoulder cut with long sleeves gives it a soft, romantic vibe. The fold-over collar looks cute but you can also style it a real neck collar and not a shoulder to shoulder wide style collar--which is a plus in a colder day or office day--very versatile and it’s surprisingly warm for cooler evenings. I’m 5'11" with a 39D bust, 28" waist, and 39" hips, and the X-L size fit just right—no awkward sagging or squeezing. It hugs in all the right places without feeling tight or overly stretched. The knit has a nice stretch to it—super soft and plush, so it’s comfy enough to wear all day. It’s thick enough to keep you cozy as temps drop, but not bulky. Overall, I’m really happy with the plush-warm quality of the knit. The stitching feels solid, with no loose threads or weird seams. It matches the description perfectly, looks flattering, and works for both casual and dressy occasions. Definitely one of those pieces that’s both pretty and warm. Read more
items.author: SilverStar

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars title
items.body: very cute keeps you warm, does get fuzz balls if you know what i mean, fit perfect and stretched over my belly. not see through either being stretched out! Read more
items.author: alexxhunter

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap Material
items.body: Very cheap material. It pilled very bad Read more
items.author: karen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and stylish!
items.body: I absolutley love this dress! I wore it to work and got tons of compliments. Its so soft and comfy, very stretchy too. The material seems to be high quality and laundered well. I washed it on cold and hung dry. Length is just like the photo shows, and so it the color. Read more
items.author: Kenzi

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and stretchy
items.body: This fit me a little strange but it was comfortable. It has an odd smell to it when it's new and for the first few washes but after that is gone it has no issues. It is super stretchy and it hugs curves well without making any unsightly areas stand out too much Read more
items.author: ChiButShy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this
items.body: A very pretty dress Read more
items.author: Nala

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Fall Fit
items.body: I ordered this dress in size XL army green. This dress is very sexy and super flattering to a curvy figure. It has quite a bit of stretch. The fabric is soft and the dress isn't heavy; it's a lightweight ribbed knit material. I think the overlay could be or should be longer at the shoulder, it's not quite as long as pictured, however, it's still long, folds properly and is very flattering to the neckline. I like the metal detailing in the center of the chest area as well. The sleeves are long and wide. The dress is long also and can be work with heels or boots. It's a great addition to my Fall wardrobe. It's on trend and comes in multiple colors. The dress is also priced well at $38.99 and with a coupon price of $27.29 it's an even better value. Read more
items.author: Adi3000

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
